title: The Halloween Party from the Black Lagoon
description: Get ready to scream, beacuse it's Halloween time in the Black Lagoon.Hubie has no costume for the scariest Halloween party ever. Too bad he can't just go as the invisible man and stay at home. Plus, there will be a ton of monsters at the party. He'd better find a costume quick or he might become a tasty treat for all those cruel ghouls!
author: Mike Thaler
